column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The food was delicious and the service over the top! We really loved what we ordered and the management was very nice -- they initally forgot to assign someone to our table so told us we could have a free dessert which was nice. Â Then they accidentally forgot to comp the dessert
column2: we pointed it out and only expected them to make that correction
column3: but they took off one of our appetizers as well and were very apologetic. Mistakes happen
column4: but they definitely went over the top and overcompensated for it
column5: which was great service. Overall it was a good experience
column7: friendly servers and it was well heated in the patio.
